item.description:
For the Third Year running, I Heart Providence will be held at City Hall, this year hosted by Mayor Angel Taveras

Enjoy Live Music, free hors d'ouvres and meet some of the interesting businesses in and around our wonderful city. And for many of us, an opportunity to see the interior architecture of City Hall.

Details are very sketchy so far, but I love the opportunity to sample some great food from local providers (Last year: Sin, Cupcakerie, Hudson Street Deli, etc.) hear live music (2009: Route 44, 2010: Miss Wensday and the New Medicinals), and chat with other Newcomers about the things that make Providence great.

See what people said the first year in the I Heart Providence confessionals:

I HEART PROVIDENCE: The People's Confessions
item.how_to_find_us: I'll Hang out at the base of the steps inside City Hall, Call me if you have problems
item.name: I *HEART* Providence
